Title: Chapter 2
Writer: Tim Minear, Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Crystal Liu (executive story editor), Todd Kubrak (story editor), Joshua Green (staff writer)
Actors: Kathy Bates, Sarah Paulson, Cuba Gooding Jr., Lily Rabe
Plot: While the Millers discover some of their house's history, Lee falls into old habits and her daughter, Flora, makes a new friend.
